content: विज् {vI.v} {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> (वेवेक्ति, वेविक्ते, विक्त) {@--1@} To separate, divide. {@--2@} To distinguish, discern, discriminate (usually with वि and allied to विच् with वि <ab>q. v.</ab>) {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> (विजते, विनाक्ति, विग्न) {@--1@} To shake, tremble. {@--2@} To be agitated, tremble with fear. {@--3@} To fear, be afraid; चक्रंद विग्ना कुररीव भूयः <ls>R. 14. 68.</ls> {@--4@} To be distressed or afflicted. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (वेजयति-ते) To terrify, frighten.
